intro.default: This page shows your upcoming transactions forcasted based on the schedule you defined. It is often helpful to look into it to see the next transactions, or for a detailed review and analysis of where the money go. It will highlight transactions in yellow if they make any of your accounts go below $50 or in red if they cause an overdraft.

intro.schedule-wizard-button: Let's plan an event now and see if we have enough money to make it happen. Click this button to schedule a new hefty transaction that will happen several months from now.
